rows.label: qev050303_MSG0001
rows.name: Wait. Are you the one who hailed me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0002
rows.name:
I told you to go home. This is a Wrothian battlefield.
There is no place for a human upon it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev050303_SEL0011
rows.name:
Agree that this grudge has
nothing to do with you.

rows.label: qev050303_JNK0020
rows.name: Shake Head

rows.label: qev050303_SEL0021
rows.name:
Say that you have business here
so long as Ge Jewhe does.

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0003
rows.name:
I like a [ST:gender p1=man  p2=woman  ]who understands.
Please go tell Vi Sezha that Ge Jewhe has perished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0004
rows.name:
And perhaps you can try to...comfort her?
I fear the news will not be easy to take.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0005
rows.name:
I would rather you were there for her than the other
Wrothians. We are something of an...awkward bunch
when it comes to feelings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0006
rows.name:
Hmph. You are nearly as meddlesome as Vi Sezha.
I can see why you two hit it off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0007
rows.name:
But you must leave. Neither you nor she understands
the depth of my resolve in choosing this path.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0008
rows.name:
I even threw away her bracelet in order to put my
former life out of my mind. Why must you keep
hounding me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0009
rows.name: ...What? Th-this is the symbol of our bond.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0010
rows.name: Rgh... Aaaaaah! Why are you DOING this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0011
rows.name:
I am about to cede my life to preserve the honor of the
Wrothian people, and you bring me THIS?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0012
rows.name:
I have cast away my personhood to become an
avenging force. If I drag my past life along with me,
I will be killed before slaying a single Ganglion dog![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0013
rows.name:
I beg of youâ€”do not follow me any further.
The Ganglion ruined all of our lives,
and our pride demands that they pay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0014
rows.name:
Amazing. Almost terrifying, really. I see now how you
humans held your own against us Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0015
rows.name:
...And thank you. I may just live to keep my promise to
Vi Sezha now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev050303_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Ge Jewhe about the promise.

rows.label: qev050303_JNK0040
rows.name: Check

rows.label: qev050303_SEL0041
rows.name: Make sure that Ge Jewhe has no more crazy plans.

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0016
rows.name:
When I became a warrior and she a jeweler, our
paths appeared to part. At that time, she made these
matching bracelets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0017
rows.name:
"Let us share this life together," she wrote upon them.
And at that moment, we swore to never part,
no matter what our futures held.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0018
rows.name:
Heartwarming, isn't it? Were I a man, I'd likely have
proposed on the spot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0019
rows.name:
In any case, that is our promise. So long as Vi Sezha
lives, I swore to protect her from any who would
threaten her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0020
rows.name: Worry not, human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0021
rows.name:
I gave my word to keep her safe for as long as I draw
breath. If I were to die, it would make me a liar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0022
rows.name:
Even if it means turning my back on the Wrothian
warrior's way, I would do it. For I would turn the
whole world widdershins for Vi Sezha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0023
rows.name:
That was so long ago, and with all that has happened
since the Ganglion came, I had forgotten about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0024
rows.name:
But when you returned this bracelet to me,
it came back so clearly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0025
rows.name: The shame stings, yet I shall return to Sezha's side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0036
rows.name:
One look at this weeping, ecstatic girl in front of me,
and all thought of the pride that drove me to such
lengths evaporates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0037
rows.name:
It is enough to make me wonder how something so
small as revenge or pride could have blinded me to
something so enormous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0026
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0027
rows.name:
Hello, um... This is Vi Sezha...
[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0028
rows.name:
I am sorry to bother you, but...my heart just started
pounding here. Just a...a bad feeling. So I called.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0029
rows.name: How goes the search? Have you found her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_JNK0050
rows.name: Confess

rows.label: qev050303_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Vi Sezha that Ge Jewhe died where she stood.

rows.label: qev050303_JNK0060
rows.name: Protect

rows.label: qev050303_SEL0061
rows.name: Keep silent out of deference to Vi Sezha's feelings.

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0030
rows.name: They killed her? Oh, Jewhe... No...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0031
rows.name:
...Ill tidings, is it? You need not shield me.
I am prepared to hear the truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0032
rows.name: Then...she died facing them? Oh, Jewhe... No...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0033
rows.name: Ah... I thought I was braced for the worst, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0034
rows.name:
F-forgive me. The inside of my head has just gone...
blank. Bring me her dagger. Please...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050303_MSG0035
rows.name: Aah...[ST:wait ]
